Jay Shaw

Graphic Designer, Front-End Developer, Web Enthusiast

Resume

Who am I?

Great question...

I'm a graphic designer and front-end developer from Omaha, NE. I have recently graduated from Omaha Code Scool where I fine-tuned my powers of HTML5 and CSS3. I'm hooked on making elements come alive with Javescript. I have a strong desire to code in pixels, think mobile first, and play all day in the DOM.

My Right Brain

The Designer side

I'm a graphic designer and front-end developer from Omaha, NE. I have recently graduated from Omaha Code Scool where I learned the powers of HTML5 and CSS3. I'm hooked on making elements come alive with Javescript. I have a strong desire to code in pixels, think mobile first, and play all day in the DOM.

My Left Brain

The Developer side

I'm a graphic designer and front-end developer from Omaha, NE. I have recently graduated from Omaha Code Scool where I learned the powers of HTML5 and CSS3. I'm hooked on making elements come alive with Javescript. I have a strong desire to code in pixels, think mobile first, and play all day in the DOM.
